name: @elizaos/example-browser-extension-safari
description: Safari extension wrapper for Chat with Webpage - see README.md for build instructions

scripts.build: if [ "$(uname)" = "Darwin" ]; then npm run convert && echo 'Now open the Xcode project in safari/Chat with Webpage/'; else echo 'Safari extension build skipped - requires macOS with Xcode'; fi
scripts.info: echo 'See README.md for detailed Safari extension build instructions'
